class saleswindow.ClosingSalesDialog(context, username, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDialog, ui_designs.Ui_closingsalesdialog.Ui_Dialog

Dialog that show up when closing sales button is pressed. Allows user to selecting duration of closing and prints information concerning it.
